description: A container with all the different types that are in the game, as well as their weaknesses and resistances

types.name: None
types.description: the None type. Empty for practical purposes.

types.name: Atomic
types.description: Most things are Nuclear now. Some leverage it more than others.

types.name: Fire
types.description: Some monsters don't want to watch the world burn, but it's nice to light a fire every now and then.

types.name: Water
types.description: The lifeblood of humanity long ago

types.name: Ice
types.description: A solid form of water. I wonder if you live there still

types.name: Plant
types.description: Leveraging the growth of the natural world.

types.name: Electric
types.description: A good spark is all it takes.

types.name: Acid
types.description: Through chemical reactions will burn through anything.

types.name: Light
types.description: Beings formed of light folded onto itself

types.name: Digital
types.description: Remnants of the digital age, these ghosts are often incorporeal

types.name: Parasite
types.description: Having no choice but to live off others
